education.institution: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Design and  Manufacturing

highlights: Development of microservices, and feature implementations for clients
Worked along with other trainees in building a web application to automate the process of buying/selling of stocks in financial markets for a trader/investor
Tech stack involving Java, Spring Boot, REST API, Microservices, Unit Testing - JUNIT5, Mockito

projects.name: Super market web app using React
projects.description: Super Market webapp with different routes such as Home, About, Products and Cart page. Different grocery products rendered from an external API, in the Products section as functional components, with the help of custom defined useFetch component. Implemented functionality to add/delete products in the cart, and render their summarized details in the Cart page

projects.name: Stock Trading Web Application
projects.description: Worked along with other trainees in building a web application to  automate the process of buying/selling of stocks in financial markets  for a trader/investor. Roles and Responsibilities: Worked on the Backend Development of the  Microservices for the application, on technologies like Java, Spring  Boot, REST API, Hibernate, SQL and JUNIT Testing

awards.title: React Certification
awards.summary: Completed interactive react course with provided supermarket web app project

awards.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
awards.summary: Passed AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Exam
Outstanding grade in Digital Electronics course during B.Tech. 2nd Year 2019
